column2: Completely paralyzed hind legs and difficulty breathing
DCT-TVA; Braf CA; ink/arf f/f; pten f/f
Brain, lungs, heart, liver, kidneys, spleen, tumor
Primary tumor found nesteled between shoulder blades--looked super deep
Slightly bloody on top of skull. There were no holes within skull despite finding tumor stuck directly to skull. Questionable in tact skull.
Heart looked enlarged and a large white node sat on top of heart and lungs.
1 cryogenic tube of tumor tissue was frozen down.
Digestive system still in perfect working condition due to urine stain of fur found before sac.
